abstract.p: Playmates Toys adds Springfield Cemetery play set, complete with tombstones and action figures; photo (Pulse column: Halloween Special) (S)

block.p: Playmates Toys has added a Springfield Cemetery play set, complete with ''Eat My Dust'' tombstones, to its line of talking ''Simpsons'' action figures and environments. A Toys ''R'' Us exclusive, the $30 set features Homer in costume as King Kong, Bart as the Fly, Mr. Burns as a very Gary Oldmanish Dracula, and the holier-than-thou Ned Flanders as the Devil. Push a button on the diabolical diorama and it's a scream. Literally. To go along, there's a $24.98 set of six ghoulish ''Simpsons'' episodes.
